BBEX3.A.KHR.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Cambodia / USD 1 = KHR ... (middle)

Source: Since March 2002: National Bank of Cambodia, Phnom Penh January 1999 - February 2002: Standard Chartered Bank, Phnom Penh 1986 - December 1998: Foreign Trade Bank of Cambodia, Phnom Penh (until the end of 1989: Foreign Trade Bank of Kampuchea)
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates (up until 2011 on the basis of buying and selling rates).
